PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-05792013-05-23,  NRCAN,  NEB,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectCertificate of Public Convenience and Necessity GC-113
PrecisOrder approving the issuance of Amending Order AO-003-GC-113 by the National Energy Board to NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. in order to reflect the confirmation of the transfer of ownership of Brazeau East Lateral Pipeline and Pembina West meter Station from NOVA Gas Transmission Limited to Keyera Partnership and the removal of said Facilities from the TransCanada Alberta System.
AttachmentsAttachment
